definition: The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金[Tuo1 er3 jin1]
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: It is a gift, a gift to the 22)throes of Mordor.
sentences.chinese: 這魔戒是送給垂死掙扎的魔朵的禮物。

sentences.english: My favorite sci-fi effect is the Balrog in Lord of the Rings.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的科幻效果就是魔戒炎魔。

sentences.english: Baggins is the wandering Hobbit who found the Ring.
sentences.chinese: 巴金斯是常在外遊歷的霍比特人，正是他撿到了魔戒。

sentences.english: I 'll take the ring to Modor, though I don"t know the way. (Frodo)"
sentences.chinese: 儘管不認識路，但我願意把魔戒帶到魔多。

sentences.english: There is one other who knew that Bilbo had the ring.
sentences.chinese: 有一個人早已知道畢爾博有魔戒。

sentences.english: The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 觀看完魔戒三部曲的時間。

sentences.english: Lord of the Rings books and films have inspired people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 《魔戒》系列書籍和電影激勵了全世界的人們。

sentences.english: But the power of the Ring could not be undone .
sentences.chinese: 但魔戒的魔力已經無法消除了。

sentences.english: The Lord of the Rings, a three volume fantasy adventure epic authored by J. R.
sentences.chinese: 《魔戒》，三卷奇幻史詩鉅著，作者是享有盛譽的J。

sentences.english: I fell in love with LOTR when I was a kid.
sentences.chinese: 我跌倒了魔戒當我還是孩子的愛。

sentences.english: Earthsea is a fantastic action-adventure saga, which is comparable to the Lord of the Rings.
sentences.chinese: 《地海傳說》是一部與《魔戒》齊名的奇幻歷險故事。

sentences.english: I wish the ring had nerver come to me.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望魔戒沒在我手中。

sentences.english: He named the Islands after the then First Lord of the Admiralty, Viscount Falkland.
sentences.chinese: 他命名爲羣島後，當時的第一魔戒金鐘，福克蘭子爵。

sentences.english: Besides, I'm a Lord of the Rings man, myself.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我自己是個《魔戒》迷。

sentences.english: The story involves LOTR characters and their adventure in our modern time.
sentences.chinese: 故事說的是魔戒裏的人物在現代的冒險。

sentences.english: Victory was near. But the power of the Ring could not be undone.
sentences.chinese: 勝利終於在望，但是至尊魔戒的力量無人能敵。

definition: treasure of spirits/Silmarillion or Quenta Silmarillion by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金
The Hobbit by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金
The Chronicles of Narnia, children's stories by C.S. Lewis
Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳
J.R.R. Tolkien (1892-1973), British philologist and author of fantasy fiction such as Lord of the Rings 魔戒
Narnia, children's fantasy world in stories by C.S. Lewis
Bilbo Baggins, hero of Tolkien's The Hobbit 霍比特人
Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
